amendment.description: An amendment numbered 104 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph Offshore Exclusions to exclude oil and gas leasing located in the North Atlantic Planning Area.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a paragraph Offshore Exclusions to exclude oil and gas leasing located in the North Atlantic Planning Area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 40).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 40).
